name: licentiously
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
sexually, in a way that is uncontrolled and socially unacceptable: Many women will behave as licentiously as any philandering male. See
licentious
More examplesFewer examplesThere is no excuse for men to speak licentiously of women.The soldiers are allowed to live very licentiously.You looked at her licentiously, and that is a mortal sin.Beware of licentiously using the body by positioning suggestively.
